siblings.question: How many siblings do you have?

householdIncome.question: What would you estimate your parents'/guardians' annual household income to be? (In CAD)

parentEducation.question: What's the highest level of education your parents have obtained?

uwaterlooConnection.question: Have any members of your household attended UWaterloo in any capacity before (as staff, student, or faculty)?

uwConnectionImpact.question: If you answered 'yes' to the above, how much would you say this impacted your decision to attend UW?

stemHousehold.question: Are any members of your household involved in, or currently working in STEM (science, technology, engineering, mathematics)?

stemInfluenceOnMajor.question: If you answered 'yes' to the above, how much would you say this impacted your decision to choose mechatronics as your major?

familyFinancialAssistance.question: Did your family provide any financial assistance to you during the course of your degree?
